title: How to use WhatsApp without phone access - Quora

response.answer_text: With the original version you can not use this WhatsApp without phone access. In this problem, I recommend you use GB WhatsApp on your device. You can download it from here for free. This app also has some amazing features that you will like. Some of great features are mentioned in below. Not get banRoot phone is not requiredUnlimited stickers and theme availableSend larger files to anyoneCopy anything like bio, statusAnd many more features you will get. Personally, I use it on my phone for last 2 years. And yeah, I do not get ban. Always remember that if you use the latest version, then you will not get ban from WhatsApp application.

you can but only by using whatsapp web on your pc or laptop, however to do this your phone needs to be nearby and turned on, the reason for this is that your whatsapp account is conected to the internet using your cell phone number as its ID, your user name and password is in reality your phone number. whatsapp web is available for windows and does not need an android emulator like bluestacks, but if you have an old version of windows you might then need to, i use it on both windows 7 and windows 10 without using an android emulator as it is made for use on these versions of windows

I've been wondering about that myself. I realize how technologically advanced what's app is but it doesn't do me any good on Quora without a persons contact information. Since most Quorans want their privacy respected I cannot use this.

I have used WhatsApp extensively, but of course there is no user manual. While there is at least one website that will allow you to send anonymously to someone’s smartphone without revealing YOUR number, I don’t think it is possible to send to someone unless you know the number to which you are sending. This only makes sense, really. You have to designate to whom the message should go, or it could go to anybody.

You can, if you have a windows PC or laptop with an internet connection. You will need to install some android emulator software like Bluestacks. Its available on the net. There are some other ways to do this on PC/laptop, but this seems easiest. Before installing, do check if your PC is up to the specifications required to run Bluestacks properly.

You can use another number from another phone. Just make sure that number is not being used by another whatsapp. To use whatsapp you only need the number to receive confirmation code. The number doesn’t have in the phone with whatsapp.

A2A. Hi Praveen .I doubt that creating a WhatsApp account without a phone number is possible. A quick Google search says it's possible .After reading one of the articles my understanding is they are basically giving a fake number to get verification code.
You can’t. You need a mobile number to get registered on WhatsApp. What probably would work is to get a virtual number online.

You cannot sign in on Whatsapp without a mobile number even they don't accept virtual number as well, your number serves as your ID since there is no username and people can look up to you using your whatsapp.
You cannot create a WhatsApp account without a phone number. A phone number is necessary inorder to create because it will also verify OTP.
Yes, I forgot how, but I remember accessing my WhatsApp account on my pc. The problem was that if I did this, I could not access on my phone, so I had to stop using my pc for that.
